nodes.text: The Boiling Sea Music Academy was a music academy on the planet Drall.

In 1 ABY, Champhra Biahin, the planet Drall's ambassador to Talus, sent a recording of the anthem Flowers of Drall, sung by young students at the academy, to the chairperson of the Dearic Garden Club as a token of gratitude for the club's help in procuring a sample of the rare Twin-Scented Natterbloom.
